sentence.text: There have been rare reports of significant respiratory depression, stupor and/or hypotension with the concomitant use of loxapine and lorazepam.
The risk of using loxapine in combination with CNS-active drugs has not been systematically evaluated.

sentence.text: Therefore, caution is advised if the concomitant administration of loxapine and CNS-active drugs is required.
